title: PBE Error 500
body: Alright, so i've spent the last 2 hours trying to find a fix for this problem, so far i've gotten nothing, i've used Hotspot and cyber, yet no results, still the goddamn Error, please riot or some jesus saviour {{champion:268}} main come to help, I've been accepted for over 7 months now and i'm starting to get pissed off, please move the link or something V_V pls Riot, respond.

replies.body: What link are you trying to access the PBE page from?  Is it an NA region url?  You should log off completely from the website, and login directly at the [na league site](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/).  You may also need to try Incognito or another browser in case a caching issue or extension is getting in the way.  I hope that helps!

I'm using this link directly. https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe-signup < , Yes it's NA, i tried that. and i tried incognito, it loaded faster, but still the error showed. i've tried i.e, chrome, and Firefox, still the same results.

Thanks for getting all that info!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can investigate these cases and find out what's going on.  I can't guarantee a fix right away, but your report can help us go in the right direction.  We'll reply back asap!

Also this is incognito http://prntscr.com/dwby7v

and this is regular Chrome http://prntscr.com/dwbyu2
Same :( Not working on any browser, cache cleared, extensions disabled.

I've been getting Error 500 as well, although I'm not accepted like you I don't think. I've been trying to get into the PBE for 3 seasons every now and then pressing the button again just to be sure. At first I thought the error was because I was using a browser no one else uses, Vivaldi, which works very similarly to chrome. However, using firefox, google chrome, and internet explorer all used the same results. No vpns or firewall blocks were happening either, so it has something to do with the actual website itself methinks
